TopicTitle: How to post photos in the Forums?

Articles.Content:
I have been on KSP for almost a year, but I still can't post a photo, please take mercy on my mortal soul

Edited March 21, 2017 by Alpha 360
"Kouston, we have several problems, but that doesn't matter so we want to continue on with the mission."

Hi Alpha, if you post the URL to an image the forum will embed it for you, for example this totally random image...

Is just this url pasted here, http://img10.deviantart.net/28b5/i/2015/112/b/4/minmus_treat_by_y0rshee-d8qp0rx.png

If you want to post any of your own images I recommend you upload them to Imgur first, then view the image to get the full url.

Hope this helps.

http://imgur.com/bIYjfD8 like this?

Edited March 21, 2017 by Alpha 360
"Kouston, we have several problems, but that doesn't matter so we want to continue on with the mission."
The URL has to end in the file extension to embed properly, e.g. jpg, png, gif or whatever.
